name: SERVE & HELP CHARITABLE TRUST (SHCT)
briefDescription: Serve & Help Charitable Trust (SHCT) is an indigenous non-denominational, non-profit, non-political, faith ministry and social service organization was founded on 8th May 2013 under the Indian Trust Act of 1882.. It is interested to building an integrated Trust developed through multifarious spiritual and social service activities like Health and Education, Childcare, Women Empowerment, Plantation, care for old aged, Awareness Programmes, Dispensaries, Skill Development Programme, Relief & Rehabilitation Programme. Now, we particularly focus to improve the lives and outcomes for destitute, orphaned and abandoned children by creating community based family style group homes and emphasize on socioeconomic development in society.
